div.class: inner col col10 first last id0d737b22-c6b5-4f2a-a17e-8772fdbf43ee
inner col col14 first last id2af7ddb9-9c2e-4f97-a392-13bd35829e5b

div.p:
PUBLIC NOTICE!
THIS FACILITY IS TEMPORARILY CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC
As Effingham County Officials continue to monitor the evolving situation surrounding the Coronavirus (COVID-19), we believe for the safety and welfare of our employees and the public to implement the following action.
Effective at 5:00 pm Wednesday, March 18, 2020 as a precautionary measure to limit the possibility of COVID-19 exposure from person to person contact, Effingham County Government will restrict access to public County Buildings and Facilities. Effingham County will continue to provide services, and all County employees will be required to report daily as normal. As this situation continues to develop, if necessary, adjustments may be made.
Residents needing to conduct business with a County department should contact said department by phone or email. Questions can be directed to the following closed offices as follows:
Board of Commissioners (912) 754-2123
Recreation Department (912) 754-6339
Development Services (912) 754-2128 or 2105
This action will remain in place until further notice.
